title: 1912 T207 Brown Background Ted Easterly PSA 5
author: rand1com

posts.post_title: 1912 T207 Brown Background Ted Easterly PSA 5
posts.post_content:
For sale is a 1912 T207 Ted Easterly card that has been graded PSA 5. 

The Easterly card is a very low pop at just 24 copies graded by PSA. There are only 2 graded higher than this example.

Latest comp was an REA Auction on 11/13/22 for a PSA 4 that sold for $570.

I'm offering this one on Net 54 for $475 PPFF shipped.

Both this card and the PSA 4 that recently sold are older PSA holders so the grading for both cards should be relative to each other at the time graded with this example being the better example.

I will be listing (6) different graded Broadleaf backs and (6) different Red Cycle backs over the next day or so.
